text: Futhi Senzele ubuhle kulelizwe nasempilweni yakwelizayo ngempela thina singabaphendukele kuwena (uMvelinqangi) wathi, “isijeziso sami ngiyothweswa ngaso ubunzima lowo engimthandayo nobubele bami bungamele zonke izinto ngakho-ke (umusa wami) ngizowubekela kulabo abenza okuhle futhi abakhokha izakaah (ingxenye ethize engcebeni yabo) kanye nalabo abakholelwa emavesini ethu”
